unit.comment: /* ** 2008 October 28 ** ** The author disclaims copyright to this source code. In place of ** a legal notice, here is a blessing: ** ** May you do good and not evil. ** May you find forgiveness for yourself and forgive others. ** May you share freely, never taking more than you give. ** ************************************************************************* ** ** This file contains a no-op memory allocation drivers for use when ** SQLITE_ZERO_MALLOC is defined. The allocation drivers implemented ** here always fail. SQLite will not operate with these drivers. These ** are merely placeholders. Real drivers must be substituted using ** sqlite3_config() before SQLite will operate. ** ** $Id: mem0.c,v 1.1 2008/10/28 18:58:20 drh Exp $ */
/* ** This version of the memory allocator is the default. It is ** used when no other memory allocator is specified using compile-time ** macros. */

/* ** This routine is the only routine in this file with external linkage. ** ** Populate the low-level memory allocation function pointers in ** sqlite3GlobalConfig.m with pointers to the routines in this file. */

function.name: sqlite3MemSetDefault
